docs.text: docker-lambda # lambci/docker-lambda Run as a API server # docker run --rm \ --name d-lambda \ -p 9001:9001 \ --net=minio-lambda-net \ -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=minioadmin \ -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=minioadmin \ -e DOCKER_LAMBDA_STAY_OPEN=1 \ -v "$PWD":/var/task \ lambci/lambda:nodejs10.x \ index.handler $ curl -X POST -d '{}' http://localhost:9001/2015-03-31/functions/myfunction/invocations
docs.title: Home

docs.title: Run as a API server
